response.explain: The previous action code has successfully heated the meat in the oven. Now, we need to take the meat out of the oven and put it on the plate.
response.subtask:
(1) Take the meat out of the oven
(2) Put the heated meat on the plate
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
    # Subtask 1: Take the meat out of the oven
    pork_chop = registry(env,"pork_chop_188")
    oven = registry(env,"oven_wuinhm_0")
    toggle_off(robot, oven)
    donothing(env)
    open(robot, oven)
    donothing(env)
    EasyGrasp(robot, pork_chop)
    donothing(env)
